channel.title: R visualization on Coronavirus Cabin Fever
channel.description: Recent content in R visualization on Coronavirus Cabin Fever

item.title: Coronavirus cases in Germany
item.description:
This is my attempt to visualize some SARS-CoV-2 data with some R code (please pardon the non-optimal layout). German data is obtained from [Robert Koch Institute]. Data up to April 1, 2020 (not updated every day).
Cumulative number of confirmed SARS-CoV-2 cases in Germany in linear scale since 100th case Only the top 10 states with the highest number of cases are plotted.
Number of confirmed cases (Logarithmic scale)
